title: AI, Semiconductors, Water Tech: What PM Modi, Dick Schoof Discussed

title: Digital battle turns ugly: BJP drags Congress to privileges panel over AI video
description: A political storm brews in Parliament as Congress faces a breach-of-privilege notice over AI-generated videos amid the AI Summit in Delhi. The clash highlights the rising role of artificial intelligence in India's political narrative and digital expression.
content: As the AI Summit continues in the national capital, a fresh political confrontation over artificial intelligence has erupted in Parliament, with the Indian National Congress facing a breach-of-privilege notice over an AI-generated video shared on its... [2758 chars]

title: AI Summit: Navigating the new defaults of the agentic web
description: Artificial intelligence is reshaping the digital world. Machines are now primary actors, handling tasks from booking flights to autonomous warfare. This shift concentrates power in AI invocation, potentially making businesses invisible if not chosen by AI. The internet's future will see bots exceeding human traffic, requiring a re-evaluation of existing structures.
content:

title: Shashi Tharoor Lauds AI Impact Summit Amidst Criticism and Controversy
description: Congress leader Shashi Tharoor praised the AI Impact Summit's success despite some glitches and criticism. He highlighted the significance of global leaders attending with a unified message of advancing artificial intelligence. Tharoor also addressed issues on defence discussions and criticized the film Kerala Story for potentially inciting hate.

title: Is AI’s authoritarianism a bigger threat than Trump’s?
description: As predicted, or feared, rapid advances in artificial intelligence are poised to upend U.S. society. We are not ready.
content:

title: India likely to join US-led strategic alliance 'Pax Silica'
description: India is set to join the US-led Pax Silica alliance. This strategic partnership aims to build robust supply chains for critical minerals and artificial intelligence. The move signifies strengthening India-US ties. Pax Silica focuses on economic and technology cooperation.

title: Bill Gates Cancels a Keynote Speech Amid Epstein Controversy
description: The philanthropist made the announcement on Thursday, after having earlier confirmed his participation in a prominent artificial intelligence summit in India.
content:
The philanthropist and Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates canceled a high-profile speech at an artificial intelligence summit in India amid fresh scrutiny of public figures who maintained relationships with Jeffrey Epstein.
